resources.string: A convenient web client for the massive multiplayer online game Pardus, offering fast and secure access to your account.

New features:
Visited pages remember their last zoom level and scroll position.
Zoom buttons are not displayed anymore if your phone supports multi-touch.
Both changes can be disabled in the Settings.
Please visit our Google Play page for details.
An update is available for your image pack.
Local image packs are not supported anymore in this version of Android, the one selected in your account settings on pardus.at will be used instead.
